mapper.select: select f.feed_id , f.project_id , (select m.name from member m where m.member_id = f.member_id) AS name , f.content , DATE_FORMAT(f.date,'%Y-%m-%d') as date , ff.feed_file_id , ff.ori_photo_name , ff.photo_name , p.project_name from feed f left join feed_file ff on ff.feed_id = f.feed_id left join project p on p.project_id = f.project_id WHERE f.project_id = #{project_id} order by f.feed_id ASC

SELECT f.feed_id ,f.content ,ff.feed_file_id ,ff.ori_photo_name ,p.project_id ,p.project_name FROM feed f left join feed_file ff on ff.feed_id = f.feed_id left join project p on p.project_id = f.project_id WHERE f.feed_id = #{feed_id}
